description :
The clinical status of the condition
NOTE: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the Conformance expectation extension

multipleOr
comparator
modifier
chain

expression : Condition.clinicalStatus

mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)
mulitpleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)

description.value: **The clinical status of the condition** **NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the [Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html) - multipleAnd - multipleOr - comparator - modifier - chain
